description.value: When your skeletons and zombies attack, their skeletal claws and rotting hands clutch and tear flesh. Weaker foes are caught in their grip. You command your horde to perform a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Mobbing Assault]. Instead of being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard], a creature who takes physical damage from failing the saving throw is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] by your horde (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] on a critical failure). The DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] from your horde is equal to your spell DC. Creatures grabbed by your horde that fail a saving throw against the horde's Mobbing Assault take @Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]] damage.
